price: 2. O, jullie die geloven! Waarom zeggen jullie datgene wat jullie niet doen?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
